p: Seven essential oils were selected for the present study. These oils were extracted by steam distillation from Cymbopogon flexuosus (lemon grass-LG), C. martini (palm rosa-PR), Eucalyptus citridora (EC), Tagetus minuta (TM), Pelargonium sp (geranium- GE), C. winterianus (citronella-CI) and Mentha arvensis (MA). These essential oils contain terpenoids and their derivatives. All the essential oils used in the present study were kindly supplied by Central Institute for Medicinal and Aromatic Plants, Boduppal, Hyderabad.
